Class SurveyDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurveyDatabaseHelper
  • public class SurveyDatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class connects to a database to persist survey data between runs of the app. There are string constants for all database attributes as well as a connection field and a title field. There are methods to create the table for the database, insert new questions, retrieve surveys, retrieve a list of all survey titles, delete a survey, clear the table, establish a connection, and close the connection.
    See Also:
    Survey, Question

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SurveyDatabaseHelper​(java.lang.String surveyTitle)
